00055 class CLibAvVideoDecoderComp:
00056                      public ibase::CLoggerComponentBase,
00057                      virtual public icam::IBitmapAcquisition,
00058                      virtual public imeas::ISampleAcquisition,
00059                      virtual public imm::IVideoController
00060 {
00061 public:
00062        typedef ibase::CLoggerComponentBase BaseClass;
00063 
00064        enum MessageId
00065        {
00066               MI_CANNOT_OPEN = 0x56a20,
00067               MI_FORMAT_PROBLEM
00068        };
00069 
00070        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(CLibAvVideoDecoderComp);
00071               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(iproc::IProcessor);
00072               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(icam::IBitmapAcquisition);
00073               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(imeas::ISampleAcquisition);
00074               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(istd::IChangeable);
00075               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(imm::IMediaController);
00076               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(imm::IVideoInfo);
00077               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(imm::IVideoController);
00078               I_ASSIGN(m_bitmapObjectCompPtr, "BitmapObject", "Bitmap object where current bitmap is stored", false, "Bitmap");
00079               I_ASSIGN(m_audioSampleObjectCompPtr, "AudioSampleObject", "Sample sequence object where current audio sample is stored", false, "AudioSequence");
00080               I_ASSIGN(m_tracePositionAttrPtr, "TracePosition", "If enabled, all position changes will be updated in preview objects", true, true);
00081               I_ASSIGN(m_grabProgressiveAttrPtr, "GrabProgressive", "If enabled the next frame will be returned by image and sample grab, if false only current frame will be returned", true, false);
00082               I_ASSIGN(m_minimalImageDistanceAttrPtr, "MinimalImageDistance", "Minimal distance between two grabbed images if progressive grabbing enabled", false, 0.1);
00083        I_END_COMPONENT;
00084 
00085        CLibAvVideoDecoderComp();
00086        virtual ~CLibAvVideoDecoderComp();
00087 
00088        // reimplemented (icam::IBitmapAcquisition)

00090

00097                             const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,
00098                             const istd::IPolymorphic* inputPtr,
00099                             const istd::IChangeable* outputPtr) const;

00101                             const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,
